description.value:
The Patron you choose lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

The Undying
Spell LevelSpells
cantrip@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.OMXnxuJi49IrjhP9]{Guidance}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.C3uvPVk3rv4o9IB0]{Resistance}
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFalseLife0]{False Life}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplRayOfSickn]{Ray of Sickness}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.mycojDbHOZg2luJc]{Blindness/Deafness}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.TsXoAnsMto2MIufg]{Silence}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.AbTlFX9o2Lmnjr9n]{Feign Death}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.1YC9ZKgPOv0oCbTH]{Speak with Dead}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.uXfYWzBEwej7LOZr]{Aura of Life}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.OnYKg4boLKhXpmlX]{Death Ward}
